info.name: Voat - Android Holo / Gmail Dark Theme
info.description: Makes voat.co look like an Android 4.x holo dark app, with emphasis on minimizing wasted space (huge margins / padding) as well as modernizing (web 2.0'ing!) the color scheme
info.additionalInfo: Important Make sure you have the Ubuntu font installed. Get it from here: http://font.ubuntu.com/ For best results, go to voat.co settings once you're logged in and make sure these are checked: Disable custom subverse styles Enable night mode (use dark theme) Not intended for touch users on small devices, as elements may be too close together. Current as of mid May 2015
